title: Smart Data models - CarbonFootprint schema
description: Data model to represent the carbon footprint in CO2 equivalents.

id.description: Property. Unique identifier of the entity.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It must be 'CarbonFootprint'

emissionSource.description: Property. Source of emissions (e.g., Transport, Energy, Industry).

CO2eq.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Amount of emissions in tons of CO2 equivalent.

emissionDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Date and time of the measurement.

location.description: GeoProperty. Geographic coordinates where the emissions were generated.

coordinates.description: Property. Coordinates of the location in [longitude, latitude].

relatedSource.description: Relationship. Reference to the data source or related entity.

description.description: Property. Additional information about the emissions source.
